---
id: create-transfer
title: 'Create a new transfer'
description: 'Creates a new transfer using the specified source and destination details.'
sidebar_label: 'Create a new transfer'

hide_table_of_contents: true

sidebar_class_name: 'post api-method'

custom_edit_url: null
---

import MethodEndpoint from '@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint';
import ParamsDetails from '@theme/ParamsDetails';
import RequestSchema from '@theme/RequestSchema';
import StatusCodes from '@theme/StatusCodes';
import OperationTabs from '@theme/OperationTabs';
import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem';
import Heading from '@theme/Heading';

<Heading as={'h1'} className={'openapi__heading'} children={'Create a new transfer'}></Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={'post'}
  path={'/accounts/{account_id}/transfers'}
  context={'endpoint'}
></MethodEndpoint>

Creates a new transfer using the specified source and destination details.

<Heading
  id={'request'}
  as={'h2'}
  className={'openapi-tabs__heading'}
  children={'Request'}
></Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[
    {
      name: 'account_id',
      in: 'path',
      required: true,
      schema: {
        title: 'Kusid',
        type: 'string',
        format: 'ksuid',
        pattern: '^[a-zA-Z0-9]{26}$',
        example: '2VcUIIsgARwVbEGlIYbhg6fGG57',
      },
      description: 'The ID of the account',
    },
    {
      in: 'header',
      name: 'Idempotency-Key',
      required: true,
      schema: { type: 'string' },
      example: 'idemp-123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000',
      description:
        'A unique string used to prevent duplicate operations. Each POST request must use a new idempotency key. Use a UUIDv4 string. Example: `idemp-123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000`\n',
    },
  ]}
></ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={'Body'}
  body={{
    required: true,
    content: {
      'application/json': {
        schema: {
          type: 'object',
          additionalProperties: false,
          required: ['amount', 'source', 'destination'],
          properties: {
            amount: {
              title: 'Amount',
              type: 'object',
              description: 'Monetary value with explicit currency',
              additionalProperties: false,
              properties: {
                value: { type: 'string', example: '11234.88' },
                currency: { type: 'string', example: 'USD' },
              },
              required: ['value', 'currency'],
            },
            source: {
              type: 'object',
              additionalProperties: false,
              title: 'PaymentData',
              properties: {
                address_id: { type: 'string', description: 'Preferred Address identifier' },
                financial_institution_id: {
                  type: 'string',
                  deprecated: true,
                  description: 'Legacy—use address_id',
                },
                transfer_type: { type: 'string' },
                value_type: { type: 'string' },
              },
              required: ['transfer_type', 'value_type'],
            },
            destination: {
              type: 'object',
              additionalProperties: false,
              title: 'PaymentData',
              properties: {
                address_id: { type: 'string', description: 'Preferred Address identifier' },
                financial_institution_id: {
                  type: 'string',
                  deprecated: true,
                  description: 'Legacy—use address_id',
                },
                transfer_type: { type: 'string' },
                value_type: { type: 'string' },
              },
              required: ['transfer_type', 'value_type'],
            },
            brand: {
              type: 'object',
              nullable: true,
              additionalProperties: false,
              required: ['account_id'],
              properties: { account_id: { type: 'string' } },
              title: 'BrandData',
            },
            note: { type: 'string' },
          },
          title: 'CreateTransfer',
        },
        examples: {
          ach_debit_to_solana: {
            summary: 'Onramp via ACH debit → Mint on Solana',
            value: {
              amount: { value: '2500', currency: 'USD' },
              source: {
                address_id: 'addr_ach_debit',
                value_type: 'USD',
                transfer_type: 'ach_debit',
              },
              destination: {
                address_id: 'addr_solana_internal',
                value_type: 'SBC',
                transfer_type: 'solana',
              },
            },
          },
          wire_offramp_with_branding: {
            summary: 'Burn on Polygon → Wire out (branding override)',
            value: {
              amount: { value: '10000', currency: 'USD' },
              source: {
                address_id: 'addr_polygon_internal',
                value_type: 'SBC',
                transfer_type: 'polygon',
              },
              destination: {
                address_id: 'addr_wire_external',
                value_type: 'USD',
                transfer_type: 'wire',
              },
              branding: { account_id: 'acct_company_beta' },
            },
          },
          rtp_payout: {
            summary: 'Stablecoin payout via RTP',
            value: {
              amount: { value: '150', currency: 'USD' },
              source: {
                address_id: 'addr_treasury_sbc',
                value_type: 'SBC',
                transfer_type: 'ethereum',
              },
              destination: {
                address_id: 'addr_rtp_external',
                value_type: 'USD',
                transfer_type: 'rtp',
              },
            },
          },
          wire_offramp_with_brand: {
            summary: 'Burn on Polygon → Wire out (brand override)',
            value: {
              amount: { value: '10000', currency: 'USD' },
              source: {
                address_id: 'addr_polygon_internal',
                value_type: 'SBC',
                transfer_type: 'polygon',
              },
              destination: {
                address_id: 'addr_wire_external',
                value_type: 'USD',
                transfer_type: 'wire',
              },
              brand: { account_id: 'acct_company_beta' },
            },
          },
        },
      },
    },
  }}
></RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{
    '201': {
      description: 'Transfer successfully created',
      content: {
        '*/*': {
          schema: {
            type: 'object',
            properties: {
              id: {
                type: 'string',
                format: 'uuid',
                example: '9f80c1f5-80df-4c5e-9b68-b9f5712d46d4',
              },
            },
          },
        },
      },
    },
  }}
></StatusCodes>
